content:
Bisam family

1 Herschl BISAM                      c1760 - 1840 #233
 + Mary                              - before 1834 (Akiwa)
  2o Rozli BISAM                     1793-97 - 1834 #210
    * Szymon Leyb GLETNER            1779 - 1828 #272
        FAMILY LISTING

    * Juda Leib SPRINGER             c1800
